          <title>
            <string language="hu">Paul Troger: Az apokaliptikus asszony története, 1732 Altenburg, bencés apátsági templom, kupolafreskó</string>
            <string language="en">Paul Troger: The story of the apocalyptical women, 1732 Altenburg, Benedictine Abbey, dome fresco.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Paul Troger: Die Geschichte der 
apokalyptischen Frauen, 1732 Altenburg, Benedictine Abtei, 
Haubefresko.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Paul Troger : L'histoire des femmes 
apocalyptiques, 1732 Altenburg, abbaye bénédictine, fresque de 
dôme.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Paul Troger: A história das mulheres 
apocalyptical, 1732 Altemburgo, abadia benedictine, fresco da 
abóbada.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Paul Troger: La storia delle donne 
apocalyptical, 1732 Altenburg, abbey benedictine, fresco della cupola.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Παuλ Troger: Η ιστορία των apocalyptical 
γυναικών, 1732 Αλτενμπουργκ, benedictine αβαείο, νωπογραφία 
θόλων.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Paul Troger: La historia de las mujeres 
apocalípticas, 1732 Altenburgo, abadía benedictina, fresco de la
bóveda.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A Jelenések könyvének epizódjai</string>
            <string language="en">The episodes of the Book of Revelation</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Honoré mester,  breviárium,  gótikus könyvfestészet,  miniatúra,  Szép Fülöp,  13. század,  </string>
            <string language="en">Master Honoré, breviary, Gothic book painting, miniature, King Philip II, 13th century</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Episoden des Buches von Enthüllung</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les épisodes du livre de la révélation</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os episodes do livro do revelation</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli episodi del libro della rivelazione</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα επεισόδια του βιβλίου της αποκάλυψης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los episodios del libro de la revelación</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorlagenhonoré, Breviary, gotischer Buchanstrich, 
Miniatur, König Philip II, 13. Jahrhundert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Honoré principal, bréviaire, peinture gothique de 
livre, miniature, roi Philip II, 13ème siècle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Honoré mestre, breviário, pintura gothic do livro, 
miniatura, rei Philip II, 1ó século</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Honoré matrice, breviary, pittura gotica del libro, 
miniatura, re Philip II, tredicesimo secolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κύριο Honorι, ιερή σύνοψη, γοτθική ζωγραφική βιβλίων, 
μικρογραφία, βασιλιάς Philip ΙΙ, 13$ος αιώνας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Honoré principal, breviario, pintura gótica del libro,
miniatura, rey Philip II, décimotercero siglo</string>
          </keyword>
